Detailed Description

Module to support operations on core such as TLB config, etc.

Revision
96463

Function Documentation

int cvmx_core_add_fixed_tlb_mapping ( uint64_t  vaddr,
uint64_t  page0_addr,
uint64_t  page1_addr,
cvmx_tlb_pagemask_t  page_mask 
)

Adds a fixed (wired) TLB mapping.

Returns TLB index used or -1 on error. Assumes both pages are valid. Use cvmx_core_add_fixed_tlb_mapping_bits for more control. This is a wrapper around cvmx_core_add_wired_tlb_entry()

Parameters:
vaddr Virtual address to map
page0_addr page 0 physical address
page1_addr page1 physical address
page_mask page mask.
Returns:
Success: TLB index used (0-31) Failure: -1
int cvmx_core_add_fixed_tlb_mapping_bits ( uint64_t  vaddr,
uint64_t  page0_addr,
uint64_t  page1_addr,
cvmx_tlb_pagemask_t  page_mask 
)

Adds a fixed (wired) TLB mapping.

Returns TLB index used or -1 on error. This is a wrapper around cvmx_core_add_wired_tlb_entry()

Parameters:
vaddr Virtual address to map
page0_addr page 0 physical address, with low 3 bits representing the DIRTY, VALID, and GLOBAL bits
page1_addr page1 physical address, with low 3 bits representing the DIRTY, VALID, and GLOBAL bits
page_mask page mask.
Returns:
Success: TLB index used (0-31) Failure: -1
int cvmx_core_add_wired_tlb_entry ( uint64_t  hi,
uint64_t  lo0,
uint64_t  lo1,
cvmx_tlb_pagemask_t  page_mask 
)

Adds a wired TLB entry, and returns the index of the entry added.

Parameters are written to TLB registers without further processing.

Parameters:
hi HI register value
lo0 lo0 register value
lo1 lo1 register value
page_mask pagemask register value
Returns:
Success: TLB index used (0-31 Octeon, 0-63 Octeon+, or 0-127 Octeon2). Failure: -1
